page.title: 06LANGHOLM'S INDUSTRY
page.content: IN LANGHOLM THE MAIN{INDUSTRY}IS {WEAVING}WHICH TAKES PLACE IN 5 LARGE MILLS.THEY ARE {REID AND TAYLOR'S {,WOOLLY MILL,BELL'S,NEILL'S,}AND { {EDINBURGH WOOLLEN MILL. }THESE MILLS ARE NOT ONLY INVOLVED IN WEAVING,THEY ALSO PERFORM OTHER PROCESSES WHICH ARE IMPORTANT TO THE PRODUCTION OF CLOTH.THIS INDUSTRY BEGAN DUE TO LANGHOLM'S SITUATION IN A SHEEP FARMING AREA. ANOTHER INDUSTRY WHICH IS RELATED TO SHEEP FARMING IS THE { {'SKINYARDS'}AS IT IS KNOWN LOCALLY. THIS IS ACTUALLY A {FELLMONGERS}.A FELL IS THE ROUGH HAIR COVERED SKIN OF A DEAD ANIMAL,e.g.,A SHEEPSKIN.A FELLMONGER'S JOB IS TO REMOVE THE HAIR BEFORE THE TANNING PROCESS BEGINS. THE NEWEST OF ALL THE LOCAL INDUSTRIES IS{ {BORDER FINE ARTS },WHO PRODUCE CERAMIC MODELS IN A SUBSTANCE KNOWN AS THORIANWARE.
